page.title: 14 LEISURE
page.content: Recreations in Rainford include TV and other various clubs some of which are outdoor sports.In Rainford there is a senior school which offers many sports such as football,rugby etc.and also chess and music groups.Clubs in Rainford include tennis,cricket,bowls, jogging,video games,ju jitsu and other martial arts. The countryside around Rainford is very scenic and many people enjoy walking.Often there are cycle races organised along the cycle-paths of the Rainford By-pass.Although some cycle, many teenagers find their life-styles restricted by lack of transport facil- ities as Rainford has few youth clubs and no discos.Teenagers have to go into St.Helens for fashion shops and weekend activities.Adults also have to travel into St.Helens for the cinema and theatre.
